programme.title: Wo hu cang long
Przyczajony tygrys, ukryty smok
Wo hu cang long
programme.desc:
Wo hu cang long: Directed by Ang Lee. With Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh, Ziyi Zhang, Chang Chen. A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0190332/","name":"Wo hu cang long","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDdhMzMxOTctNDMyNS00NTZmLTljNWEtNTc4MDBmZTYxY2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0190332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Larry-17"},"dateCreated":"2001-01-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Magical Romance...","reviewBody":"There's a telling moment near the beginning of Ang Lee's "Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon."

In closeup, we see the rough-hewn, heavy wooden wheels of a peasant cart. They nestle in deep ruts worn into the stone paving blocks of a roadway entering a gated city. The cart rumbles on, its wheels fitting perfectly into the grooves worn by unspoken centuries of just such passing wagons...in one image we see how tradition creates its own paths, how contemporary reality is fabricated to fit such traditions... The camera rises, we see an almost impossible panorama of Peking, the Forbidden City spreading out before us like an Oz extending to the horizon.

What a film this is: a superb action adventure romance with terrific acting and a much-welcome heart underlying the technical superiority.

"Crouching Tiger...", I am told, is representative of a specific literary/cinematic genre in China: Wu Xia...the wizard/warrior piece...magic and martial arts blended. I'm not familiar with the form, but the world portrayed here is a breathtakingly fantastical one. The story is putatively set in 19th century China, but it could be anywhere, anywhen. It is a place of high honor and deep feelings, a place where people are bound by traditions and held captive by their forms. It is also a place of wild and mythic landscapes...from stark desert (thought nowhere do we get that featureless, wide-screen linear horizon seen in David Lean's "Lawrence of Arabia!") to magic misty green mountains with deep dark lakes and steeply cascading streams that come braiding, tumbling down the rockslide heights. High, reedy bamboo forests wave, wondrous, in sighing winds.

In this world people may do amazing things. The flying in this movie -- properly called "wire work" in film terms -- is fantastic. This technique, of course, was not invented by the Wachowski's, but the choreographer of "Crouching Tiger...", Woo-ping Yuen, also staged the wire-fights of "Matrix." Here, the ability of our warrior heros and villains to climb walls, to leap to the rooftops and soar from building to building -- not to mention engaging each other in aerial combat that soars from the peak of a mountain top to the rocks of a mountain stream in a single take -- or to duel on the very tips of dipping, waving bamboo trees -- looks almost plausible, just over the border of the possible, at least. The whole packed-in audience at the big theater at the advanced screening at Pipers Alley in Chicago burst into spontaneous applause several times throughout...

At other moments, I found myself in weepy transport. As I think of the fight in the treetops, right now, I become drippy -- tingly of eye and sinus.

Apart from all else, this is grand storytelling! It has passion, love, revenge...it expresses deep need and longing.

And, yes, the woman are the action hearts of the film! Michelle Yeoh is wonderful...but I've been in love with her for years. Here, she is more mature, quieter, wiser than in any role I've seen her in. Her performance is strong and moving, her face registering, magically, a range of conflicting emotions, hidden secrets, crouching angers, all at once. In acting training we were always told you can't do that. She does it.

Chow Yun Fat, too...I've been a fan of his since I first discovered John Woo's Hong Kong crime thrillers...is the best I've ever seen, as well...magnificent in his silences. Strength without cruelty.

The center of the film is a girl who looks to be about 15! Ziyi Zhang whose date of birth is given as 1979. Zhang is from Beijing, China, and has only one other film credit. She is remarkable. Her story is the film's binding element. And this newcomer holds it together! Holding her own with Yeoh and Chow in both dramatic material and in the balletic martial pas des dieux's that frame the conflicts between characters. She is the "Luke Skywalker" of the piece, if you will...though "Crouching Tiger..." has everything the "Star Wars" saga aspires to: excitement, thrills and magic. Here however, technical fireworks are wrapped heart and deeply resonant spirit. Elements Lukasfilm wanted to have, but which it succeeded in providing only in the most self-conscious way.

By the way: this is an action film, almost uniquely without violence...or, rather, the violence is so stylized, so removed into some mystical realm, that it almost disappears into dance. There is, I believe, only one small splash of blood on-screen. Typically, I don't like that -- figuring that if you're going to do a film where violence is part of it all, where action advances plot, let's have it full-bore, the "Full Peckinpaw," if you will. Here, however, this stylization works beautifully with action sequences that take the breath away and inspire a sense of awe, rather than simply leave you white-knuckled and sweaty.

There are those who will grumble that Jackie Chan (another favorite of mine) does it all for real, without wires and tricks. True enough... But here that exuberance of motion is in service of a grand story and strong characters who carry worthwhile emotional burdens!

I won't be able to wait for the DVD, and will probably see it again, perhaps see it twice before it hits the home-market.

My recommendation: Just go see it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":261834,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-03-21","keywords":"china,female martial artist,defying gravity,tragic hero,mixed martial arts","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1046455321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY1ZjQ4YzAtODZmNy00M2JhLTkwNzItNjA0NDFmZDM2MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY1ZjQ4YzAtODZmNy00M2JhLTkwNzItNjA0NDFmZDM2MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000334/","name":"Chow Yun-Fat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000706/","name":"Michelle Yeoh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0955471/","name":"Ziyi Zhang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000487/","name":"Ang Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078389/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041248/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910924/","name":"Hui-Ling Wang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770005/","name":"James Schamus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0874631/","name":"Kuo Jung Tsai"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Ammonite: Directed by Francis Lee. With Sarah White, Liam Thomas, Sam Parks, Kate Winslet. 1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7983894/","name":"Ammonite","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM3ZGZlMWUtMjY1OS00NjBkLWE4MjQtODJkMmQ1MzdjYzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7983894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"reyesrh"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Silence Art","reviewBody":"I just wanna point out that the scenes with no dialogue are the one's that say a lot ... Kate Winslet masters the way she talks only with her eyes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13798,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-11-13","keywords":"lesbian romance,female scientist,period drama,based on real person,lesbianism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4176724249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1840s, acclaimed self-taught palaeontologist Mary Anning works alone on the wild and brutal Southern English coastline of Lyme Regis. The days of her famed discoveries behind her, she now hunts for common fossils to sell to rich tourists to support herself and her ailing widowed mother. When one such tourist, Roderick Murchison, arrives in Lyme on the first leg of a European tour, he entrusts Mary with the care of his young wife Charlotte, who is recuperating from a personal tragedy. Mary, whose life is a daily struggle on the poverty line, cannot afford to turn him down but, proud and relentlessly passionate about her work, she clashes with her unwanted guest. They are two women from utterly different worlds. Yet despite the chasm between their social spheres and personalities, Mary and Charlotte discover they can each offer what the other has been searching for: the realisation that they are not alone. It is the beginning of a passionate and all-consuming love affair that will defy all social bounds and alter the course of both lives irrevocably."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519680/","name":"Saoirse Ronan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428121/","name":"Gemma Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037450/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605911/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

The Heart Dances - The Journey of the Piano: The Ballet
programme.desc: The Padre: Directed by Jonathan Sobol. With Tim Roth, Nick Nolte, Luis Guzmán, Juana Arboleda. Retired Judge Randall and his hired gun, Gaspar, track down a con man posing as a priest in a small Colombian town only to be thrown off-course by a scrappy 16-year-old girl intent on reuniting with her sister in the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6782276/","name":"The Padre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmRiZTBmMGYtZjQwMy00NmJlLWE2ZDktZTA3MWU2MDcwMDViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ3MTUzMjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Retired Judge Randall and his hired gun, Gaspar, track down a con man posing as a priest in a small Colombian town only to be thrown off-course by a scrappy 16-year-old girl intent on reuniting with her sister in the United States.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6782276/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"larrys3"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lacks Dramatic Tension & Suspense","reviewBody":"Set in Colombia, Tim Roth portrays a pickpocket and conman disguised as a padre, as he tries to escape the pursuing ex-Marshal Nick Nolte, who believes Roth was responsible for the death of his pregnant daughter. Nolte has hired Luis Guzman, a local police officer, to help him in this pursuit and to smooth things over when Nolte disrespects the local populace or their customs. Finally, Valeria Henriquez is quite engaging as the young charmer Lena, who is desperate to join her sister in Minnesota (sold online to a family when they were both in a church orphanage) and will even team up with the "padre" to get there.\n\nWith this good cast and storyline I guess I expected more from this movie, but it lacked dramatic tension and suspense and came across as too flat-toned. Overall, it just never seemed to gel into anything substantial, as I see it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1515,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-28","keywords":"girl","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Padre","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi181189401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI4NzM0OGEtY2ZhMi00MmY4LWExZGEtOWYzYWQ0MTYzZWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI4NzM0OGEtY2ZhMi00MmY4LWExZGEtOWYzYWQ0MTYzZWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000619/","name":"Tim Roth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350079/","name":"Luis Guzmán"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1038286/","name":"Jonathan Sobol"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133523/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053578/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3127634/","name":"Stephen Kunc"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gott, du kannst ein Arsch sein
Boże, ale z ciebie dupek
Gott, du kannst ein Arsch sein
programme.desc:
Gott, du kannst ein Arsch sein: Directed by André Erkau. With Sinje Irslinger, Max Hubacher, Til Schweiger, Heike Makatsch. A young girl in Germany graduates from high school, then gets a cancer diagnosis. She decides to enjoy the time she has left instead of spending her remaining time in the hospital, and goes on an adventure with an unexpected travel companion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11458628/","name":"Gott, du kannst ein Arsch sein","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y1ZDRhZDAtZmM2Zi00MTZlLTk1NGMtMDdiYjA3OGE0Njk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young girl in Germany graduates from high school, then gets a cancer diagnosis. She decides to enjoy the time she has left instead of spending her remaining time in the hospital, and goes on an adventure with an unexpected travel c","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11458628/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kaljic"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't Bother","reviewBody":"Seen on a trans-Atlantic flight to Europe.

The most generous thing I can say about this movie is that it is a Bucket List copy-cat, only the main protagonist is a teenage girl. She has been diagnosed with terminal cancer and goes off, away from home, to experience one adventure after another.

The movie tries too hard to be serious and hip at the same time and fails miserably. The acting is predictable and one-dimensional and the plot and "adventures" incredulous.

The only noteworthy aspect of this movie is that it has perhaps the funniest title of any movie in recent memory. Still, stay away, far away, from this film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":283,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-10-01","keywords":"profanity in title,title appears in writing,tattoo on chest,father daughter relationship,terminal illness","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5321052/","name":"Sinje Irslinger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4056269/","name":"Max Hubacher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001709/","name":"Til Schweiger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1839743/","name":"André Erkau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183929/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049524/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010760/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1452691/","name":"Thomas Vass"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0457776/","name":"Katja Kittendorf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10422371/","name":"Frank Pape"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tangled
Zaplątani
Tangled
programme.desc:
Tangled: Directed by Nathan Greno, Byron Howard. With Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy, Ron Perlman. The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0398286/","name":"Tangled","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxNDYxMjg0MjNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDcyNTk2OTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0398286/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"intelearts"},"dateCreated":"2011-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"My 354th Review: Excellent entertainment - really","reviewBody":"With jaw-dropping graphics and an abundance of heart this is simply what you would wish for in a fairy tale: memorable, magical, and magnificent.

We cannot remember the last time we saw a film that was simply so entertaining - there is almost nothing to complain about here in any way and much to praise from values to comedy to several scenes that were genuinely moving - this really is one of the best movies of the year and deserves its massive box office success.

If perhaps you are reluctant to see it as you think it will just rehash old Disney ideas or be unsuitable for small children I would say those are always my first concerns, but here for the first time in a very long time I can honestly say that here we have a film that holds its own integrity and so, even with the villain's death, you don't feel that it was put in to scare.

All in all, a magical, hilarious, witty, and very well thought through movie that deserves the Oscar that is surely coming to it - simply the best animated movie of the year as, more even than Toy Story 3, it rises beyond animation to make a wonderful heart-filled adventure that makes for very satisfying viewing indeed.

Thank you, Disney.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":426157,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2010-12-01","keywords":"rapunzel,based on fairy tale,disney,flower,female protagonist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tangled: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi385091865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMzI2NDA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1OTYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMzI2NDA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1OTYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The long-haired Princess Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but when she falls in love with a bandit who was passing by she must venture into the outside world for the first time to find him."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601553/","name":"Mandy Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157048/","name":"Zachary Levi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614220/","name":"Donna Murphy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1977355/","name":"Nathan Greno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0397174/","name":"Byron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342278/","name":"Jacob Grimm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342303/","name":"Wilhelm Grimm"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Right One
Ten jedyny
The Right One
programme.desc: The Right One: Directed by Ken Mok. With Cleopatra Coleman, Iliza Shlesinger, Leanne Lapp, David Koechner. Sara, a novelist struggling with writer's block, needs inspiration - and finds it when she meets Godfrey, a down-on-his-luck oddball who constantly changes personas and alter egos in order to cope with his past and avoid reality. Just as Godfrey begins to open up to Sara, he discovers that she's been using him as inspiration for her next novel, and he vanishes from her life. Did Sara just lose the man of her dreams, or will she be able to find him and make things right?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6820128/","name":"The Right One","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGI0ZGJlNzAtNDMxNi00N2E4LWEyNGMtNDA0OWE5MWQ4ZDhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjA3MzE2ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sara, a novelist struggling with writer's block, needs inspiration - and finds it when she meets Godfrey, a down-on-his-luck oddball who constantly changes personas and alter egos in order to cope with his past and avoid reality. programme.title: An American Pickle
Amerykanin w marynacie
An American Pickle
programme.desc: An American Pickle: Directed by Brandon Trost. With Seth Rogen, Sarah Snook, Molly Evensen, Eliot Glazer. An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"G00fhunter"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Something to watch","reviewBody":"This movie was not bad but not good either.It kept my attention but wasn't anything spectacular or anything I'll even remember watching for that matter.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20691,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-08-06","keywords":"time travel,time traveler,immigrant,jewish,brooklyn","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3105799705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"AN AMERICAN PICKLE, directed by Brandon Trost, is based on Simon Rich's New Yorker novella and stars Seth Rogen as Herschel Greenbaum, a struggling laborer who immigrates to America in 1920 with dreams of building a better life for his beloved family. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. programme.title: The Hangover Part II
Kac Vegas w Bangkoku
The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: The Hangover Part II: Directed by Todd Phillips. With Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha. Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1411697/","name":"The Hangover Part II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2MTM4MzY2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQ3NzI4NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1411697/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lolabeningfield"},"dateCreated":"2011-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Re-hashing of Old Material","reviewBody":"I was really optimistic going into the theatre, I didn't expect it to as great as the original, but I thought it would still be good movie. But most of the material was stuff taken from the original only tweaked, and I hate to say it but I was actually bored for a good part of the movie. Some of the jokes/scenes dragged to long, to the point where I didn't find them funny anymore. There were some good moments, but the truly outrageous/original scenes that made the original so great were too few and far between. Some of the scenes were more outrageous in the sense that there was some full frontal nudity, but I'm not someone who finds that super entertaining. Overall it felt to me like a re-hash of stuff that had already been done with some naked people thrown in, and it just wasn't enjoyable like the first movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":480421,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-05-26","keywords":"wedding,strip club,pubic hair,hangover,bachelor party","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Hangover: Part II - Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2196348185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTE0Njc0MDFeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDUzNjU0MjMx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTE0Njc0MDFeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDUzNjU0MjMx._V1_.jpg","description":"Phil, Stu, Alan and Doug travel to Bangkok for Stu's wedding. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0302108/","name":"Zach Galifianakis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1159180/","name":"Ed Helms"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221959/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0563301/","name":"Craig Mazin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0035905/","name":"Scot Armstrong"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Atonement
Pokuta
Atonement
programme.desc: Atonement: Directed by Joe Wright. With Saoirse Ronan, Ailidh Mackay, Brenda Blethyn, Julia West. Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0783233/","name":"Atonement","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRiYjE0YzItMzk3Zi00ZmYwLWJjNDktYTAwYjIwMjIxYzM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0783233/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena"},"dateCreated":"2007-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Love And Death In a Cold Climate","reviewBody":"The superb Ian McEwan book translated into cold beautiful images by the startling Joe Wright and scriptwriter Christopher Hampton. The result is a series of powerful rushes and abrupt stops. A pacing that, perhaps, is a bit too self conscious for its own good doesn't help us to connect the emotional dots. I had the feeling I had lost something in the love story of the protagonists - something that didn't happen to me reading the book. By the time the "injustice" takes place I was taken by the pain of the injustice but not by Knightley and McAvoy's liaison. Their love story is left to its own devices. The beauty of the images is overwhelming and the assuredness of Joe Wright at his second feature after the, much better, "Pride and Prejudice" keeps you going. The score tends to be monotonous and irritating but in spite of all that I intend to see "Atonement" again and I would recommend it with just the above mentioned reservations.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":265210,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-01-23","keywords":"world war two,rape,false accusation,sex,loss of virginity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Atonement","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3836805401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM1MjUwMzgwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDM3ODM4._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM1MjUwMzgwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDM3ODM4._V1_.jpg","description":"Atonement trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564215/","name":"James McAvoy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000950/","name":"Brenda Blethyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942504/","name":"Joe Wright"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568605/","name":"Ian McEwan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358960/","name":"Christopher Hampton"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

The result is a series of powerful rushes and abrupt stops. A pacing that, perhaps, is a bit too self conscious for its own good doesn't help us to connect the emotional dots. I had the feeling I had lost something in the love story of the protagonists - something that didn't happen to me reading the book. By the time the "injustice" takes place I was taken by the pain of the injustice but not by Knightley and McAvoy's liaison. Their love story is left to its own devices. The beauty of the images is overwhelming and the assuredness of Joe Wright at his second feature after the, much better, "Pride and Prejudice" keeps you going. The score tends to be monotonous and irritating but in spite of all that I intend to see "Atonement" again and I would recommend it with just the above mentioned reservations.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":265210,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-01-23","keywords":"world war two,rape,false accusation,sex,loss of virginity","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Atonement","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3836805401","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM1MjUwMzgwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDM3ODM4._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM1MjUwMzgwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDM3ODM4._V1_.jpg","description":"Atonement trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564215/","name":"James McAvoy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000950/","name":"Brenda Blethyn"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942504/","name":"Joe Wright"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568605/","name":"Ian McEwan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358960/","name":"Christopher Hampton"],"duration":"PT2H3M"</script><metacontent="

Dystopia
programme.desc:
Dystopia: With Lola Zackow, Madeleine Martin, Johan Hafezi, Erik Bolin. Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt14111834/","name":"Dystopia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzM3NDZhZmEtZjY3NS00NGIxLTg1NWMtNmRjZjQ4NDk2YTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY0MTE3NzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt14111834/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"music-richardmichaelsson"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Creepy, unsettling and best Swedish TV-series in Years","reviewBody":"I'll say right off the bat, I didn't really know who some of these Swedish actors were but as a resident of Sweden since a while back I had seen Johan Hedenberg. A wonderful actor.

What struck me right away was the extremely good, scored intro, the music throughout Dystopia is of I am a genuine fan of classic horror, so I was a bit suspicious when I heard VIAPLAY was doing Dystopia but boy was I surprised for a number of reasons.

The first is it kept me wondering what exactly was going on. There was just enough there to build atmosphere and tension without giving away the surprise. And it was delivered with such skill and care that it truly unfolded masterfully. You know something is wrong. You know something is up. But you can't quite figure out what it is. The Director of Dystopia is Richard Jarnhed and I need to keep an eye out for his future endeavors as he is madly talented.

And secondly this was directed by just one director. Richard directed all 8 episodes and that's not normal in Scandinavia.

And lastly, it gave us something new. This is possibly the best aspect because I am sick to death of cookie cutter horror movies. People nowadays have forgotten that horror doesn't just mean blood and guts. Before directors had to create tension and atmosphere by building the plot and unraveling the story slowly. It's refreshing to see this done with such care.

The acting is wonderful and directing is amazing. I was totally blown away by the music!

It is always nice to see a TV-series with some twists, and also those that give you some food for thought.

I am a bit blown away by the rather week reviews in Swedish press. One outlet even writes that it's outside the box and that they love the box. I am sure Dystopia will do very well internationally!

If you like Horror tension and at the same time mystery tension you should see Dystopia.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2300,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2021-06-13","keywords":"lesbian kiss,lesbian sex,topless female nudity,larp,larpers","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11198177/","name":"Lola Zackow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4477198/","name":"Madeleine Martin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7154476/","name":"Johan Hafezi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004517/"}]}</script><metacontent="

Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt14111834/","name":"Dystopia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzM3NDZhZmEtZjY3NS00NGIxLTg1NWMtNmRjZjQ4NDk2YTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY0MTE3NzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt14111834/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"music-richardmichaelsson","dateCreated":"2021-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Creepy, unsettling and best Swedish TV-series in Years","reviewBody":"I'll say right off the bat, I didn't really know who some of these Swedish actors were but as a resident of Sweden since a while back I had seen Johan Hedenberg. A wonderful actor.

What struck me right away was the extremely good, scored intro, the music throughout Dystopia is of I am a genuine fan of classic horror, so I was a bit suspicious when I heard VIAPLAY was doing Dystopia but boy was I surprised for a number of reasons.

The first is it kept me wondering what exactly was going on. There was just enough there to build atmosphere and tension without giving away the surprise. And it was delivered with such skill and care that it truly unfolded masterfully. You know something is wrong. You know something is up. But you can't quite figure out what it is. The Director of Dystopia is Richard Jarnhed and I need to keep an eye out for his future endeavors as he is madly talented.

And secondly this was directed by just one director. Richard directed all 8 episodes and that's not normal in Scandinavia.

And lastly, it gave us something new. This is possibly the best aspect because I am sick to death of cookie cutter horror movies. People nowadays have forgotten that horror doesn't just mean blood and guts. Before directors had to create tension and atmosphere by building the plot and unraveling the story slowly. It's refreshing to see this done with such care.

The acting is wonderful and directing is amazing. I was totally blown away by the music!

It is always nice to see a TV-series with some twists, and also those that give you some food for thought.

I am a bit blown away by the rather week reviews in Swedish press. One outlet even writes that it's outside the box and that they love the box. I am sure Dystopia will do very well internationally!

If you like Horror tension and at the same time mystery tension you should see Dystopia.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2300,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2021-06-13","keywords":"lesbian kiss,lesbian sex,topless female nudity,larp,larpers","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11198177/","name":"Lola Zackow","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4477198/","name":"Madeleine Martin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7154476/","name":"Johan Hafezi"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004517/"]</script><metacontent="

Russell Poole and Jack Jackson investigate the murders of rappers Notorious B.I.G. and Tupac Shakur." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2677722/","name":"City of Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2YyNTJjYmMtOGQxZC00N2UxLWEzNjMtOGU3ZjA2MGU1NjA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1Nzg4NjY0._V1_.jpg","description":"Russell Poole and Jack Jackson investigate the murders of rappers Notorious B.I.G. and Tupac Shakur.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2677722/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"meikemarxen"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Whitaker and Depp nail it","reviewBody":"I won´t go into details of the plot, since it can be found in the description of the movie. Whitaker is outstanding in this movie imo. His natural performance and presence gives life and authenticity to the character of journalist Jack Jackson. Johnny Depp is a surprise. Playing the aging retired police officer Russell Poole, his performance is well balanced, reduced and dedicated to capture the truth of Poole´s ambition and motivation. Whitaker and Depp harmonize, and it shows in the dialogues between Jackson and Poole. Two outstanding actors in an ambitioned movie about a timeless subject: finding truth in a swamp of lies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11178,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-03-19","keywords":"reference to m.c. hammer,baseball game,singing in a police station,reference to robert f. kennedy,las vegas nevada","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"City of Lies","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3577200665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZmZDc2NWUtZDJkNC00MmM3LTg4YzMtM2E5MjdlZGMzOGRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZmZDc2NWUtZDJkNC00MmM3LTg4YzMtM2E5MjdlZGMzOGRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001845/","name":"Forest Whitaker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0403947/","name":"Toby Huss"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1026778/","name":"Brad Furman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251858/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174578/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174578/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0838300/","name":"Randall Sullivan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2757852/","name":"Christian Contreras"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

The acting of the main character is really great. Its not really a movie about Baltimore bike culture. Its more of a movie a teenager figuring his place in the world. If you like drama character driven films you will like this.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2176,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-10-08","keywords":"14 year old,14 year old boy,dirt bike,group,number as title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2394734873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWRjOTI2ZWItYWVmOC00ZjQxLTk0NTEtYmQwZjA0YWY5N2U4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWRjOTI2ZWItYWVmOC00ZjQxLTk0NTEtYmQwZjA0YWY5N2U4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this gritty coming-of-age drama, fourteen-year-old Mouse (Jahi Di'Allo Winston) desperately wants to join the Midnight Clique, an infamous group of Baltimore dirt-bike riders who rule the summertime streets. His older brother, Stro, was their top rider before his tragic death--a loss that consumes Mouse as much as his passion for bikes. Mouse's mom (Teyonah Parris) and his police mentor, Detective Rivers (William Catlett), work overtime to help the charismatic teen reach his full potential, but when the Midnight Clique's leader, Blax (Meek Mill), takes the boy under his wing, the lure of revving his own dirt bike skids Mouse toward a road way past the straight and narrow.\r\nStreaming October 8th only on HBOMax."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8091769/","name":"Jahi Di'Allo Winston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4049674/","name":"Meek Mill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2825058/","name":"William Catlett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3924049/","name":"Angel Manuel Soto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0072775/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1954466/","name":"Sherman Payne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4777327/","name":"Christopher M. programme.title: An American Pickle
Amerykanin w marynacie
An American Pickle
programme.desc: An American Pickle: Directed by Brandon Trost. With Seth Rogen, Sarah Snook, Molly Evensen, Eliot Glazer. An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"G00fhunter"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Something to watch","reviewBody":"This movie was not bad but not good either.It kept my attention but wasn't anything spectacular or anything I'll even remember watching for that matter.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20691,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-08-06","keywords":"time travel,time traveler,immigrant,jewish,brooklyn","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3105799705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"AN AMERICAN PICKLE, directed by Brandon Trost, is based on Simon Rich's New Yorker novella and stars Seth Rogen as Herschel Greenbaum, a struggling laborer who immigrates to America in 1920 with dreams of building a better life for his beloved family. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. But when he seeks out his family, he is troubled to learn that his only surviving relative is his great-grandson, Ben Greenbaum (also played by Rogen), a mild-mannered computer coder whom Herschel can't even begin to understand."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6127780/","name":"Molly Evensen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060930/","name":"Brandon Trost"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719807/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2919995/","name":"Simon Rich"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1133985/","name":"Green Lantern","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ1YTIxNzEtMzcxNC00NTUzLThkZjktMmJlYTcyMjBhMGUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1133985/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BigMaxAttacks"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"It wasn't that bad, why the hate?","reviewBody":"I saw Green Lantern with my son because it looked safe enough and I used to collect the comic books when I was a kid. I felt like I was the only guy over 20 at the theater, which I guess isn't surprising anymore. Did think there would be more adults, however, because the Green Lantern was something we read in my generation. Not sure if it's even around anymore. Being a fan of the comic book I had to go see it, and I was intrigued with the movie. After I got home I jumped on the computer and read the reviews. I was very disappointed with the professional reviews that cast stones at it, while at the same time, regular folk like myself thought it was a pretty good stab at the DC comic book version. I guess I look for something different when I go to the movies. I go to unwind and enjoy myself for a couple of hours, and Green Lantern worked for me."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":276805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-17","keywords":"comicbook movie,ring,spacecraft,alien,magical ring","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Green Lantern - 3D Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3445005593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA3NDkxNjQ3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAzOTgzNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA3NDkxNjQ3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAzOTgzNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe. more Â»"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0515116/","name":"Blake Lively"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0765597/","name":"Peter Sarsgaard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0132709/","name":"Martin Campbell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033149/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075528/","name":"Greg Berlanti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0973233/","name":"Marc Guggenheim"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Roswell, New Mexico: Created by Carina Adly MacKenzie. With Jeanine Mason, Nathan Parsons, Michael Vlamis, Lily Cowles. Centers on a town where aliens with unearthly abilities live undercover among humans. But when a violent attack points to a greater alien presence, the politics of fear and hatred threaten to expose them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7588054/","name":"Roswell, New Mexico","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzcxYjc1MGEtOGYzOC00ZTVmLWI2MDItYzUxMzExOTE2NjNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjYwNDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Centers on a town where aliens with unearthly abilities live undercover among humans. But when a violent attack points to a greater alien presence, the politics of fear and hatred threaten to expose them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7588054/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"brentage5000"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sorry, I just cant","reviewBody":"I loved the original Roswell series, and when I saw the previews for this one, I was intrigued. It looked different enough to distinguish itself, but similar enough to not appear vastly different. Them being adults instead of kids was interesting, and the changed-around races and jobs could have worked. Unfortunately, it's lost in a sea of expositional arguing (don't tell, show) and agenda (political, real, or pretend)-driven drama. Waited 20 minutes to start feeling something but I couldn't. Too bad, because without the forced statements and with another pass at the script, it might have had something. Maybe other less aware viewers will find something to it, but I gotta give it a pass.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11074,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2019-01-15","keywords":"remake,location in series title,city name in series title,alien","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3471005/","name":"Jeanine Mason"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1452155/","name":"Nathan Parsons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4266732/","name":"Michael Vlamis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065354/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0429120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087778/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6092900/","name":"Carina Adly MacKenzie"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Comic-Con Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2764552985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGViMmM3NDQtNGMwOC00ZjU2LWJiYjktZjA4ZTMwMDFjMzg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGViMmM3NDQtNGMwOC00ZjU2LWJiYjktZjA4ZTMwMDFjMzg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the Comic-Con Trailer for "Roswell, New Mexico," a new series coming to the CW."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Monsters, Inc
Potwory i spółka
Monsters, Inc.
programme.desc: Monsters, Inc.: Directed by Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich. With John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Mary Gibbs, Steve Buscemi. In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0198781/","name":"Monsters, Inc.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NTI0ODUyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTEyNjQ0MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0198781/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vchimpanzee"},"dateCreated":"2004-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Adorable, funny, perfect voice casting for the lead roles","reviewBody":"I thought Billy Crystal and John Goodman were great. I like them anyway, but I can't imagine anyone else in their roles. John Goodman comes across as a warm, fuzzy teddy bear type in so many of his roles, and this time he was actually drawn that way. Crystal and Goodman were great together, even when their characters showed signs of not getting along. And Boo sounded so natural, so childlike. There's no way an adult could have done her lines the way they were executed.\n\nAnd the writing was so intelligent, this movie was not just for kids. There were a lot of clever jokes that kids might not get. Still, the warm and fuzzy qualities of so many of the monsters make this a perfect choice for kids as well as adults, and I really don't get why ABC couldn't give this a TV-G rating. It may have been a little violent or scary at times, but never all that intense. Kids see worse on Saturday morning."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":858820,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2002-04-10","keywords":"monster world,monster,human nonhuman relationship,portal door,scream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"3D Re-release Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi518890521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODc5NTE4OTI3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDQ4NjMyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODc5NTE4OTI3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDQ4NjMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000345/","name":"Billy Crystal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0316701/","name":"Mary Gibbs"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798899/","name":"David Silverman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881279/","name":"Lee Unkrich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0191717/","name":"Jill Culton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682066/","name":"Jeff Pidgeon"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0198781/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"vchimpanzee","dateCreated":"2004-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Adorable, funny, perfect voice casting for the lead roles","reviewBody":"I thought Billy Crystal and John Goodman were great. I like them anyway, but I can't imagine anyone else in their roles. John Goodman comes across as a warm, fuzzy teddy bear type in so many of his roles, and this time he was actually drawn that way. Crystal and Goodman were great together, even when their characters showed signs of not getting along. And Boo sounded so natural, so childlike. There's no way an adult could have done her lines the way they were executed.\n\nAnd the writing was so intelligent, this movie was not just for kids. There were a lot of clever jokes that kids might not get. Still, the warm and fuzzy qualities of so many of the monsters make this a perfect choice for kids as well as adults, and I really don't get why ABC couldn't give this a TV-G rating. It may have been a little violent or scary at times, but never all that intense. programme.title: Monsters University
Uniwersytet Potworny
Monsters University
programme.desc:
Monsters University: Directed by Dan Scanlon. With Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Steve Buscemi, Helen Mirren. A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1453405/","name":"Monsters University","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyODgwMDU3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTM4MjcxOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1453405/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"clumbj"},"dateCreated":"2013-07-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nostalgic film for the old and young","reviewBody":"The first Monsters Inc. came out when i was just 7 years old and immediately became one of my all time favourites from the day I saw it. With extremely high expectations in mind and excitement especially for Pixar's close attention to relevance (as I am actually at university now myself) I went to see the new one as soon as it came out.

The film is a prequel following closely to our much loved earlier Characters, Mike and later Sully as they present to us their lives prior to the first movie. As well as an adorable new cast of monsters which are equally lovable as the old ones.

To my delight, the film exceeded most if not all my earlier expectations. The plot is well written, funny and most of all extremely heart warming especially to long time fans like myself as well as those younger viewers that might not have even seen the first one.

The nostalgic element of the film is perhaps the most well written. Every twist and turn reveals a huge or tiny explanation to the events and habits of the characters that I previously saw in the first film. Questions I never even asked myself, like why Randall's eyes are so squinty or how Sully and Randall's rivalry originated. 

Although i absolutely loved the movie, perhaps its because I've waited for 12 years but at some points it left me slightly unsatisfied and I'd have loved for some parts to be explained more thoroughly. 

Regardless of my only criticism, the movie made me laugh, cried with tears of joy, almost actually cried and was both heart warming and action packed. What more could you ask for? I urge those fans of the first film as well as anyone that just wants to have a good time at the cinema to see it. It'll be well worth your time!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":340716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-06-19","keywords":"1980s,monster,university,fraternity,cheating","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final [Exam] Trailer ","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2206049817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNTc3MzY3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTYzOTk1OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNTc3MzY3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTYzOTk1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Mike Wazowski and James P. Sullivan are an inseparable pair, but that wasn't always the case. From the moment these two mismatched monsters met they couldn't stand each other. Monsters University unlocks the door to how Mike and Sulley overcame their differences and became the best of friends."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000345/","name":"Billy Crystal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000114/","name":"Steve Buscemi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0768959/","name":"Dan Scanlon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0768959/","name":"Dan Scanlon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314870/","name":"Daniel Gerson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0047916/","name":"Robert L. Baird"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

I had high expectations, was hoping for a decent sci-fi movie but instead I got a quite boring drama. I wouldn't say the actors were bad, far from that, Natalie Portman and the rest did their job, but the story was just weak, certainly for the first half of the movie. The movie was also much too long, certainly for the story they wanted to tell. I wouldn't waste too much time on this one if I were you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7051,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-10-04","keywords":"astronaut,close up of eye,multiple aspect ratios,character name in title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Now Playing Only In Theaters","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2276769561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjhjNDUxYWItMjkzOC00OWNlLTk2MzItOTRjMjMzMGJlZDhiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjhjNDUxYWItMjkzOC00OWNlLTk2MzItOTRjMjMzMGJlZDhiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astronaut Lucy Cola's space mission leaves her deeply moved by the experience of seeing her life from afar. programme.title: Argo
Operacja Argo
Argo
programme.desc:
Argo: Directed by Ben Affleck. With Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, Alan Arkin, John Goodman. Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1024648/","name":"Argo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzljNjY3MDYtYzc0Ni00YjU0LWIyNDUtNTE0ZDRiMGExMjZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1024648/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cheche1"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good movie but took a lot of liberties","reviewBody":"This is a great movie. The story, acting, pacing, editing, etc. was just fantastic. Affleck's directing was solid, and the suspense will keep you entertained right through to the last seconds. I loved it. 

It did have one irritating thing, though, kind of a big one. It pointed most of the accolades to Affleck's character and the CIA. This really was not true. It was Ken Taylor and the Canadians who really pulled 'the Canadian Caper' off so successfully.

"When Taylor heard a few years ago that Mendez had sold movie rights to his book (which, to be fair, is much more generous than the movie about Canada's role), "I said, 'Well, that's going to be interesting.'...."The movie's fun, it's thrilling, it's pertinent, it's timely," he said. "But look, Canada was not merely standing around watching events take place. The CIA was a junior partner."

"The old postscript sent the message that, for political reasons, Canada took the credit. A sarcastic kicker noted that Taylor received 112 citations. The clear implication was that he did not deserve them."(Sept/Oct., 2012, thestar.com)".

So the USA does another revision on history here. I believe 'Argo' goes this far. Yes, it's based on a true story - the movie does it's best to allude that it sticks to technical accuracy. And it really does, in some ways. Historical pictures of flag burners, rioters, gate climbers, etc.. up against Argo film stills run by during the credits make it seem that the facts were adhered to down to the tiniest detail. In reality, it wasn't Tony Mendez or the CIA who were responsible for the success of this operation; actually they were barely there. 

Since the movie premiered, Ben Affleck has added emphasis on the movie postscripts since then that gives kudos to the Canadians' role. This was after Ken Taylor politely complained, as a Canadian would tactfully do. But Affleck did this only after pressure from Taylor himself.

I can understand the need to spice up events to make them as exciting and entertaining as possible, don't get me wrong. But this film needs to let the audience know that more explicitly than it does, even after the changed postscripts.

Still, a really entertaining and riveting film, very well done, and easily worth seeing. As a matter of fact, don't miss it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":593452,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-11-21","keywords":"iran,hostage,u.s. embassy,escape,american embassy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Picture","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1537319449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186505/","name":"Bryan Cranston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209646/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184096/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006516/","name":"Chris Terrio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5410196/","name":"Tony Mendez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2646452/","name":"Joshuah Bearman"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

The story, acting, pacing, editing, etc. was just fantastic. Affleck's directing was solid, and the suspense will keep you entertained right through to the last seconds. I loved it. 

It did have one irritating thing, though, kind of a big one. It pointed most of the accolades to Affleck's character and the CIA. This really was not true. It was Ken Taylor and the Canadians who really pulled 'the Canadian Caper' off so successfully.

"When Taylor heard a few years ago that Mendez had sold movie rights to his book (which, to be fair, is much more generous than the movie about Canada's role), "I said, 'Well, that's going to be interesting.'...."The movie's fun, it's thrilling, it's pertinent, it's timely," he said. "But look, Canada was not merely standing around watching events take place. The CIA was a junior partner."

"The old postscript sent the message that, for political reasons, Canada took the credit. A sarcastic kicker noted that Taylor received 112 citations. The clear implication was that he did not deserve them."(Sept/Oct., 2012, thestar.com)".

So the USA does another revision on history here. I believe 'Argo' goes this far. Yes, it's based on a true story - the movie does it's best to allude that it sticks to technical accuracy. And it really does, in some ways. Historical pictures of flag burners, rioters, gate climbers, etc.. up against Argo film stills run by during the credits make it seem that the facts were adhered to down to the tiniest detail. In reality, it wasn't Tony Mendez or the CIA who were responsible for the success of this operation; actually they were barely there. 

Since the movie premiered, Ben Affleck has added emphasis on the movie postscripts since then that gives kudos to the Canadians' role. This was after Ken Taylor politely complained, as a Canadian would tactfully do. But Affleck did this only after pressure from Taylor himself.

I can understand the need to spice up events to make them as exciting and entertaining as possible, don't get me wrong. But this film needs to let the audience know that more explicitly than it does, even after the changed postscripts.

Still, a really entertaining and riveting film, very well done, and easily worth seeing. As a matter of fact, don't miss it.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":593452,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-11-21","keywords":"iran,hostage,u.s. embassy,escape,american embassy","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Picture","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1537319449","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador. ","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186505/","name":"Bryan Cranston","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209646/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184096/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006516/","name":"Chris Terrio","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5410196/","name":"Tony Mendez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2646452/","name":"Joshuah Bearman"],"duration":"PT2H"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
Kong: Wyspa Czaszki
Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc:
Kong: Skull Island: Directed by Jordan Vogt-Roberts. With Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L. Jackson, Brie Larson, John C. Reilly. After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3731562/","name":"Kong: Skull Island","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDg0OGM1NWEtNDEwOC00OTE2LTliZWEtNzg1MTZkNjFlMmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA4NjE0NjEy._V1_.jpg","description":"After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3731562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Her-Excellency"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Completely Entertaining Throughout","reviewBody":"THIS is the way a movie should be done.

Have you ever watched the scene from The Princess Bride where the grandfather tells the kid: It's got everything. "Fencing, fighting, torture, revenge, giants, monsters, chases, escapes, true love ...". Well, in a way, that's this version of KONG, and I am really happy and surprised at just how GOOD it was.

Take a bit of the original Kong, mix it with one part Private Ryan, a dash of The Deer Hunter, some Monty Python, lots of Jurassic Park, a pinch of A Space Oddity and mix well with some (insert your favorite lower-key funny movies HERE). The result is a pleasing fare one can really sink their teeth into and enjoy.

It has some familiar faces too, and what's best about it, is that not only do they live up to their so-called stardom, but even the unfamiliar or not-yet- "famous" actors with smaller roles, really do a great job and sell it. At no time while you are watching this movie do you feel it far-fetched or unbelievable that Kong actually exists, and isn't that, in a nutshell, what all movies should aspire to - the suspension of disbelief? Mission accomplished on this one, and good job to the creators.

A definite must-watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":301537,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2017-03-08","keywords":"giant spider,monster movie,giant monster,monster versus monster,pointless self sacrifice","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"4K Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2174206745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM5ZWRmOGItNDYwZS00NTY1LTg5YzMtYmRhN2M5Y2I2MTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM5ZWRmOGItNDYwZS00NTY1LTg5YzMtYmRhN2M5Y2I2MTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1089991/","name":"Tom Hiddleston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488953/","name":"Brie Larson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3611349/","name":"Jordan Vogt-Roberts"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0562497/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0319659/","name":"Dan Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1440919/","name":"Max Borenstein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2081046/","name":"Derek Connolly"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="
